official-title.#text:
Directing the Attorney General to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of any emails in
			 the possession of the Department of Justice that were transmitted to or
			 from the email account(s) of former Internal Revenue Service Exempt
			 Organizations Division Director Lois Lerner between January 2009 and April
			 2011.
